verses.verse: ( Nehemiah’s Prayer) ( 50 30:1-10 ) דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> diḇ·rê [These are] the words נְחֶמְיָ֖ה <WH5166> nə·ḥem·yāh of Nehemiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son חֲכַלְיָ֑ה <WH2446> ḥă·ḵal·yāh of Hacaliah: וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> way·hî vvv בְחֹֽדֶשׁ־ <WH2320> ḇə·ḥō·ḏeš- In the month כִּסְלֵו <WH3691> kis·lēw of Chislev, ( Chislev is the ninth month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of November and December.) שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> šə·naṯ year, עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> ‘eś·rîm in the twentieth וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> wa·’ă·nî while I הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> hā·yî·ṯî was בְּשׁוּשַׁ֥ן <WH7800> bə·šū·šan of Susa, הַבִּירָֽה׃ <WH1002> hab·bî·rāh in the citadel
